about.title: Software Engineering and Development
about.intro: I'm Diego Tellez, a software engineer with over two decades of programming experience. My journey spans from C and Java to modern frameworks and cloud technologies. I'm proficient in multiple programming languages, experienced with AWS services, and skilled in DevOps practices. Beyond coding, I'm a certified merchant ship pilot. Currently, I'm an AI Applications Engineer specializing in NLP, managing complex distributed systems and providing technical support for cutting-edge platforms.
